Name: Gualberto
description:
Gualberto is 38 years old and is married to Sra. Daniela. They live in the city of It√°. His business involves selling fruits and vegetables.

Gualberto says that he currently has a plot where he plants melons and tomatoes. He also has a vehicle that he uses to transport his products. In addition, he provides cargo transport services. Gualberto is a hardworking client who has made many sacrifices in order to get ahead. He strives to provide better living conditions for his family.

Sr. Gualberto is requesting a loan so that he can invest in the purchase of various fruits and vegetables. This will enable him to restock his business, which gives him a way of improving his living conditions.
